name: Infected System
description:
NEW UPDATE:
  • Weather change! (storm and snow)
  • Falling matrix
  • Added Mountains for background
  • Save and reset game in pause menu
  • Auto load from saved data
  • Improved background music
  • Some bug fixes
BEEP,  the computer  has detected a virus... Inside the virtual world, the laws of physics change... Your journey starts here, Terminate the virus!

(Infected System is a game made for the GameShell BOOOM Jam. THEME: SHIFT)

(Made with PICO-8)

I interpreted the theme as: Dimensional Shift (teleport from one place to another)

IMPORTANT:
  1.  You can only teleport when standing in front of a portal.
  2.  To create items in inventory, use UP and DOWN arrows to select and RIGHT arrow to create.
  3.  The golden item you get from killed enemy is the bug of the virus, when you find enough bugs, you can create an antivirus, when you have enough antivirus, you can create a key, which you need to place at 5 different key holes to finish the game.
  4.  Red portals are linked to each other, the golden portal can only be used after inserted 5 keys.
  5.  20 bugs -> 1 antivirus, 2 antivirus -> 1 key
Controls:

(Save or Delete game data from the pause menu)

X = Shoot

C, RIGHT-ARROW, LEFT-ARROW = Navigation

DOWN-ARROW = Teleport or place antivirus

C + UP-ARROW =  Open and close inventory

Have FUN :D
